scenes.description: FLOW GLOW concluding their performance and waving goodbye.
Transition sequence with countdown visuals and song title card.
Intro card for the next song.
Performance of 'Our Time Yellow' by ReGLOSS.

subtitles.original: 以上、私たちFLOW GLOWでした！
subtitles.english: That was us, FLOW GLOW!

subtitles.original: こっから先も楽しんでいこう！
subtitles.english: Let's keep enjoying the rest!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: Tame the fire and fall before my justice
subtitles.english: Tame the fire and fall before my justice

subtitles.original: Final warning, you know my rage is limitless
subtitles.english: Final warning, you know my rage is limitless

subtitles.original: On the advent of a new genesis
subtitles.english: On the advent of a new genesis

subtitles.original: I'm infamous, yeah, I get a little villainous
subtitles.english: I'm infamous, yeah, I get a little villainous

subtitles.english: Look into my eyes, I'll take you unraveled

subtitles.original: Truth and lies that you just can't hide
subtitles.english: Truth and lies that you just can't hide

subtitles.english: What do I have to sacrifice?

subtitles.original: 空覚えで挑む人生ゲーム
subtitles.english: Challenging the game of life with vague memories.

subtitles.original: 言い訳めいたハートに従って
subtitles.english: Following a heart full of excuses.

subtitles.original: 現実は端からfraudです
subtitles.english: Reality is a fraud from the start.

subtitles.original: 取り憑かれるオーバーな自意識愛
subtitles.english: Possessed by an excessive love of self-consciousness.

subtitles.original: 世渡り上手なあの娘はね
subtitles.english: That girl who's good at getting by in the world...

subtitles.original: 二度と被った猫外せない
subtitles.english: ...can never take off the mask she put on.

subtitles.original: 痛みを知ってしまったマジシャン
subtitles.english: The magician who learned what pain is,

subtitles.original: 手の内はまだ明かせない
subtitles.english: can't reveal their hand just yet.

subtitles.original: Yellow, Yellow ゼロからループ
subtitles.english: Yellow, Yellow, looping from zero.

subtitles.original: 点滅するピリオド
subtitles.english: A flashing period.

subtitles.original: Yellow, Yellow 染まる赤い結晶
subtitles.english: Yellow, Yellow, the red crystals are dyed...
